info.author: Andres Hirane
info.description:
The package provides a function called linear_congruence_random_generator(), wich returns a randon number based on the method of linear congruences using the following parameters:
a = 22695477
b = 1
m = 2**32
x0=1649836483

Also it provides and object called c_linear_congruences. 
It should be intialized providing the parameters x0,a,b and m. 
The object provides a method called linear_congruence_random_generator() 
wich will return a random number based on the method of linear congruences 
using the parameters of the object initialization.
info.name: ie_mbdbl2018_ahirane
info.summary: Python package to use the method of linear congruences to generate a random number
info.html_description:
The package provides a function called linear_congruence_random_generator(), wich returns a randon number based on the method of linear congruences using the following parameters: a = 22695477 b = 1 m = 2**32 x0=1649836483

Also it provides and object called c_linear_congruences. It should be intialized providing the parameters x0,a,b and m. The object provides a method called linear_congruence_random_generator() wich will return a random number based on the method of linear congruences using the parameters of the object initialization.
